name: Stark Raving Dad
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Al Jean, Mike Reiss
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer accidentally lands in a mental hospital and ends up sharing a room with a white man who thinks he is Michael Jackson.
